description.value: The halfling gains a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] action to find @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] or undetected creatures within 30 feet of them. Whenever the halfling targets a creature that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] or hidden from them, reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or 9 for a hidden one.
